description.zh-cn: 1979年至1993年间在柬埔寨成立的社会主义国家，在越南和苏联的协助下建立。1989年5月1日更名为柬埔寨国，直至1992年由联合国过渡机构接管。
description.en: A socialist state established in Cambodia from 1979 to 1993, founded with the assistance of Vietnam and the Soviet Union. It was renamed the State of Cambodia on May 1, 1989, until it was succeeded by a UN transitional authority in 1992.

description.zh-cn: 东南亚国家，在军事上支持柬埔寨人民共和国的建立和维持。
description.en: A Southeast Asian country that militarily supported the establishment and maintenance of the People's Republic of Kampuchea.

description.zh-cn: 欧亚大陆的前社会主义国家，为柬埔寨人民共和国提供协助。
description.en: A former socialist state in Eurasia that provided assistance to the People's Republic of Kampuchea.

description.zh-cn: 一场导致红色高棉政权倒台并促成柬埔寨人民共和国成立的武装冲突。
description.en: An armed conflict that led to the overthrow of the Khmer Rouge regime and the establishment of the People's Republic of Kampuchea.

description.zh-cn: 民主柬埔寨的执政党和政治运动，其政权在柬越战争中被推翻。
description.en: The ruling party and political movement of Democratic Kampuchea, whose regime was overthrown in the Cambodian-Vietnamese War.

nodes.id: 柬埔寨救国民族团结阵线

zh-cn: 柬埔寨救国民族团结阵线
en: Kampuchean United Front for National Salvation

description.zh-cn: 由对红色高棉不满的柬埔寨共产党左派成员组成的政治组织，主导成立了柬埔寨人民共和国。
description.en: A political organization formed by left-wing members of the Communist Party of Kampuchea who were dissatisfied with the Khmer Rouge, which led the establishment of the People's Republic of Kampuchea.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨人民共和国的执政党，1991年放弃马列主义并改名为柬埔寨人民党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of Kampuchea, which abandoned Marxism-Leninism and was renamed the Cambodian People's Party in 1991.

description.zh-cn: 国际组织，在柬埔寨人民共和国存在期间，其席位由民主柬埔寨联合政府代表。
description.en: An international organization where the seat for Cambodia was held by the Coalition Government of Democratic Kampuchea during the existence of the People's Republic of Kampuchea.

description.zh-cn: 一个由反对越南占领柬埔寨的多个派别组成的联合政府，在联合国拥有柬埔寨的合法席位。
description.en: A coalition government formed by various factions opposing the Vietnamese occupation of Cambodia, which held Cambodia's legitimate seat at the United Nations.

description.zh-cn: 指在1989年东欧及中欧的社会主义国家发生推翻共产党统治的急剧政治变化，影响了柬埔寨人民共和国的政治走向。
description.en: Refers to the dramatic political changes in Eastern and Central European socialist countries in 1989 that overthrew Communist rule, influencing the political direction of the People's Republic of Kampuchea.

nodes.id: 柬埔寨人民革命委员会

zh-cn: 柬埔寨人民革命委员会

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨人民共和国成立初期的行政管理机构。
description.en: The initial administrative body of the People's Republic of Kampuchea upon its founding.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨政治人物，柬埔寨人民共和国人民革命委员会主席。
description.en: Cambodian politician, Chairman of the People's Revolutionary Council of the People's Republic of Kampuchea.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨政治人物，柬埔寨人民共和国人民革命委员会副主席，负责国防部。
description.en: Cambodian politician, Vice-Chairman of the People's Revolutionary Council of the People's Republic of Kampuchea, in charge of the Ministry of Defense.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨政治人物，柬埔寨人民共和国人民革命委员会委员，负责外交部。
description.en: Cambodian politician, Member of the People's Revolutionary Council of the People's Republic of Kampuchea, in charge of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨政治人物，柬埔寨人民共和国人民革命委员会委员，负责内政部。
description.en: Cambodian politician, Member of the People's Revolutionary Council of the People's Republic of Kampuchea, in charge of the Ministry of Internal Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨政治人物，柬埔寨人民共和国人民革命委员会委员，负责新闻、出版和文化部。
description.en: Cambodian politician, Member of the People's Revolutionary Council of the People's Republic of Kampuchea, in charge of the Ministry of Information, Press and Culture.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨政治人物，柬埔寨人民共和国人民革命委员会委员，负责教育部。
description.en: Cambodian politician, Member of the People's Revolutionary Council of the People's Republic of Kampuchea, in charge of the Ministry of Education.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨政治人物，柬埔寨人民共和国人民革命委员会委员，负责卫生兼社会事务部。
description.en: Cambodian politician, Member of the People's Revolutionary Council of the People's Republic of Kampuchea, in charge of the Ministry of Health and Social Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨政治人物，柬埔寨人民共和国人民革命委员会委员，负责经济和人民福利部。
description.en: Cambodian politician, Member of the People's Revolutionary Council of the People's Republic of Kampuchea, in charge of the Ministry of Economy and People's Welfare.

nodes.id: 柬埔寨过渡时期联合国权力机构

zh-cn: 柬埔寨过渡时期联合国权力机构
en: United Nations Transitional Authority in Cambodia

description.zh-cn: 根据《巴黎和平协定》成立的联合国维和特派团，负责在过渡时期管理柬埔寨并组织选举。
description.en: A United Nations peacekeeping mission established under the Paris Peace Accords to administer Cambodia during a transitional period and organize elections.

nodes.id: 联合国安理会第745号决议

zh-cn: 联合国安理会第745号决议

description.zh-cn: 联合国安全理事会通过的一项决议，正式授权成立柬埔寨过渡时期联合国权力机构。
description.en: A resolution adopted by the United Nations Security Council that formally authorized the establishment of the United Nations Transitional Authority in Cambodia.

description.zh-cn: 联合国的六个主要机构之一，其职责是维护国际和平与安全。
description.en: One of the six principal organs of the United Nations, responsible for maintaining international peace and security.

nodes.id: 柬埔寨人民革命武装力量

zh-cn: 柬埔寨人民革命武装力量

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨人民共和国的正规武装力量。1989年更名为柬埔寨人民武装力量，1993年并入新成立的柬埔寨王家军。
description.en: The regular armed forces of the People's Republic of Kampuchea. It was renamed the Cambodian People's Armed Forces in 1989 and was integrated into the newly formed Royal Cambodian Armed Forces in 1993.

description.zh-cn: 越南的军事力量，负责训练和供给柬埔寨人民革命武装力量。
description.en: The military forces of Vietnam, which trained and supplied the Kampuchean People's Revolutionary Armed Forces.

description.zh-cn: 1993年君主制恢复后柬埔寨的国家武装力量。
description.en: The national armed forces of Cambodia after the restoration of the monarchy in 1993.

description.zh-cn: 越南高级官员，曾作为越南顾问干涉柬埔寨人民共和国的内政。
description.en: A high-ranking Vietnamese official who served as a Vietnamese advisor and interfered in the internal affairs of the People's Republic of Kampuchea.

description.zh-cn: 一种政体形式，其中只有一个政党被允许参与政治活动。柬埔寨人民革命党于1991年放弃了这一制度。
description.en: A type of state in which only one political party has the right to form the government. The Kampuchean People's Revolutionary Party abandoned this system in 1991.

description.zh-cn: 一种共产主义意识形态。柬埔寨人民革命党于1991年放弃了该意识形态。
description.en: A communist ideology. The Kampuchean People's Revolutionary Party abandoned this ideology in 1991.

description.zh-cn: 由柬埔寨人民革命党于1991年改名而来的政党。
description.en: A political party that originated from the renaming of the Kampuchean People's Revolutionary Party in 1991.

description.zh-cn: 1979年，越南出兵柬埔寨，推翻了红色高棉政权。
description.en: In 1979, Vietnam sent troops to Cambodia and overthrew the Khmer Rouge regime.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨人民共和国在柬越战争推翻红色高棉政权后成立。
description.en: The People's Republic of Kampuchea was established after the Khmer Rouge regime was overthrown in the Cambodian-Vietnamese War.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨人民共和国是在越南的协助下建立的。
description.en: The People's Republic of Kampuchea was established with the assistance of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨人民共和国是在苏联的协助下建立的。
description.en: The People's Republic of Kampuchea was established with the assistance of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨人民共和国通常被认为是越南的傀儡政权，越南军队直到1990年才撤离。
description.en: The People's Republic of Kampuchea was generally considered a puppet state of Vietnam, and Vietnamese troops did not withdraw until 1990.

relationships.source: 柬埔寨救国民族团结阵线

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨人民共和国由柬埔寨救国民族团结阵线主导成立。
description.en: The People's Republic of Kampuchea was established under the leadership of the Kampuchean United Front for National Salvation.

description.zh-cn: 在柬埔寨人民共和国存在期间，柬埔寨在联合国的席位由民主柬埔寨联合政府代表，阻碍了柬埔寨人民共和国获得国际承认。
description.en: During the existence of the People's Republic of Kampuchea, Cambodia's seat at the United Nations was held by the Coalition Government of Democratic Kampuchea, which hindered the PRK from gaining international recognition.

description.zh-cn: 受东欧剧变及苏联支持减少的影响，柬埔寨人民共和国于1989年更改国名为柬埔寨国，并寻求改变其外交和经济政策。
description.en: Influenced by the Revolutions of 1989 and reduced Soviet support, the People's Republic of Kampuchea changed its name to the State of Cambodia in 1989 and sought to alter its foreign and economic policies.

description.zh-cn: 1991年，柬埔寨人民革命党放弃了一党制。
description.en: In 1991, the Kampuchean People's Revolutionary Party abandoned the one-party system.

description.zh-cn: 1991年，柬埔寨人民革命党放弃了马列主义意识形态。
description.en: In 1991, the Kampuchean People's Revolutionary Party abandoned the ideology of Marxism–Leninism.

description.zh-cn: 1991年，柬埔寨人民革命党改名为柬埔寨人民党。
description.en: In 1991, the Kampuchean People's Revolutionary Party was renamed the Cambodian People's Party.

relationships.source: 联合国安理会第745号决议

description.zh-cn: 联合国安理会第745号决议的通过，授权成立柬埔寨过渡时期联合国权力机构，从而终结了柬埔寨国（即柬埔寨人民共和国）的统治。
description.en: The adoption of UN Security Council Resolution 745 authorized the establishment of the United Nations Transitional Authority in Cambodia, thereby ending the rule of the State of Cambodia (the People's Republic of Kampuchea).

relationships.target: 联合国安理会第745号决议

description.zh-cn: 联合国安全理事会通过了第745号决议。
description.en: The United Nations Security Council passed Resolution 745.

relationships.source: 联合国安理会第745号决议
relationships.target: 柬埔寨过渡时期联合国权力机构

description.zh-cn: 联合国安理会第745号决议授权成立柬埔寨过渡时期联合国权力机构。
description.en: UN Security Council Resolution 745 authorized the establishment of the United Nations Transitional Authority in Cambodia.

relationships.source: 柬埔寨人民革命委员会

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨人民革命委员会是柬埔寨人民共和国成立初期的政府机构。
description.en: The Kampuchean People's Revolutionary Council was the governing body of the People's Republic of Kampuchea in its early stages.

relationships.target: 柬埔寨人民革命委员会
柬埔寨人民革命委员会

position.en: Vice-Chairman (in charge of Ministry of Defense)

relationships.target: 柬埔寨人民革命委员会

position.en: Member (in charge of Ministry of Foreign Affairs)

relationships.target: 柬埔寨人民革命委员会

position.en: Member (in charge of Ministry of Internal Affairs)

relationships.target: 柬埔寨人民革命委员会

position.zh-cn: 委员（负责新闻、出版和文化部）
position.en: Member (in charge of Ministry of Information, Press and Culture)

relationships.target: 柬埔寨人民革命委员会

position.en: Member (in charge of Ministry of Education)

relationships.target: 柬埔寨人民革命委员会

position.zh-cn: 委员（负责卫生兼社会事务部）
position.en: Member (in charge of Ministry of Health and Social Affairs)

relationships.target: 柬埔寨人民革命委员会

position.zh-cn: 委员（负责经济和人民福利部）
position.en: Member (in charge of Ministry of Economy and People's Welfare)

relationships.source: 柬埔寨人民革命武装力量

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨人民革命武装力量是柬埔寨人民共和国的正规武装力量。
description.en: The Kampuchean People's Revolutionary Armed Forces was the regular armed force of the People's Republic of Kampuchea.

relationships.target: 柬埔寨人民革命武装力量

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨人民革命武装力量由越南武装部队训练和供给。
description.en: The Kampuchean People's Revolutionary Armed Forces was trained and supplied by the Vietnam Armed Forces.

relationships.source: 柬埔寨人民革命武装力量

description.zh-cn: 1993年柬埔寨大选后，柬埔寨人民武装力量（柬埔寨人民革命武装力量的后续名称）与其他派别的部队合并，组建了柬埔寨王家军。
description.en: After the 1993 Cambodian general election, the Cambodian People's Armed Forces (the successor name to the KPRAF) was integrated with troops from other factions to form the Royal Cambodian Armed Forces.

description.zh-cn: 作为河内和金边之间的联络官，黎德寿干涉柬埔寨内政，对柬埔寨人民共和国政府施加了强大影响。
description.en: As the liaison officer between Hanoi and Phnom Penh, Lê Đức Thọ interfered in Cambodian internal affairs, exerting strong influence over the government of the People's Republic of Kampuchea.
